#summary Release Notes.

===Version 0.1.7 alpha ===

  * Optimized data retrieval.
  * Edge thickness indicating connectivity strength.
  * Vertex mouse tool tip show cell data related to the brain region. 

===Version 0.1.5 alpha ===

  * Edge labels indicate connectivity strength.
  * Mouse tool tip indicates reference for connection between brain regions.

===Version 0.1.2 alpha===

  * Powerpoint export of current graph

===Version 0.1.1 alpha===

  * Initial client-server communication with the [http://n2.talis.com/wiki/Main_Page Talis n2 store] using [http://www.w3.org/TR/rdf-sparql-query/ SPARQL]
  * Initial version of expand / collapse nodes
